Module de.chojo.sadu.queries
Package de.chojo.sadu.queries.api.execution.writing

Interface CalledBatchQuery

All Known Implementing Classes:
CalledBatchQueryImpl
public interface CalledBatchQuery
The CalledBatchQuery interface represents a batch query that can perform insert, update, and delete operations on a data source.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ManipulationBatchResult<ManipulationResult>
    delete()
    Deletes the selected items or records from the data source.
    InsertionBatchResult<InsertionResult>
    insert()
    Inserts the specified values into the table.
    InsertionBatchResult<InsertionResult>
    insertAndGetKeys()
    Inserts the specified values into the table.
    ManipulationBatchResult<ManipulationResult>
    update()
    Executes update operations as part of a batch query.

  • Method Details

    • insert

      InsertionBatchResult<InsertionResult> insert()
      Inserts the specified values into the table.
      Returns:
      The InsertionBatchResult that represents the results of the insert operations.

    • insertAndGetKeys

      InsertionBatchResult<InsertionResult> insertAndGetKeys()
      Inserts the specified values into the table.

      Additionally, generated keys will be retrieved.

      Returns:
      The InsertionBatchResult that represents the results of the insert operations.

    • update

      ManipulationBatchResult<ManipulationResult> update()
      Executes update operations as part of a batch query. Returns the result of the update operation.
      Returns:
      The ManipulationBatchResult that represents the results of the update operations.

    • delete

      ManipulationBatchResult<ManipulationResult> delete()
      Deletes the selected items or records from the data source.
      Returns:
      The ManipulationBatchResult that represents the results of the delete operations.
